title: MyCSUNClass
content:
## Project Specification
* **Project Type**: UI/UX Case Study and Web App
* **Source Code**: [GitHub](https://github.com/BishoyAbdelmalik/COMP-584-CSUN-Enrollment-Redesign)

## Problem
CSUN Students needs a seamless experience selecting classes because the current systme of selecting the right classes classes are fragmented. 

### Common Complaints
* Classes fill up too fast.
  * Students I spoke to had late registration dates
* Scheduling conflicts.
  * Students tend to spend too much times figuring out their classes.
  * Students have to weigh their options to between different class time
* Finding relevant classes.
  * Student have to find an old email frpm an academic advisor
  * Navigate through the CSUN University Catalog or student portal.
seoDescription: A webapp that allows CSUN students to wishlist their classes
